Hello, I am Ciel Dean!

Aspiring Graphic, Web, or UI/UX Designer!

ABOUT

I received my bachelor's degree in computer science from Batangas State University. As a student of computer science, my interest in technologies makes me detail-oriented and has helped me develop a problem-solving mindset. My soft skills improved as well from experiencing internship and group projects throughout my journey to make me adaptable and cooperative.

As vast as the technology used in the world right now, I am kinda leaning towards designing because it helps me to be more creative and in a way to solve problems in understanding the needs and different perspectives that impacts people. As a student, I was mostly assigned in designing in group projects and even in the internship. Looking forward, I am eager to deepen my understanding of user design principles to create a visually appealing and improved functional designs that enhances user experience.

Food Expiration Tracker

Mobile UI Design

School Project

This design is created for a school project in our subject Technopreneurship. We, students are tasked with creating a ideation table and one of the requirements is to create a mobile design based on our choosen topic. This task involves finding solution to a specific problem related to Sustainable Development Goals.


This idea is developed to contribute to the Sustainable Development Goal 12: Responsible Consumption and Production. Here is the overview of the pages within the design, each are accompanied with brief description. Home page involves an interface that provides information about what the project is all about. Login Page and Signup page shows the functionality of ensuring security for the provided users. Profile Page serves as a platform within the project that enables users to create and manage their profile. Scan page refers to the process of scanning of information from food products with the use of the app. Main page consists of the products and information related on tracking the food expiration dates. The Add food page is a specific feature of allowing users to input or add information about the food item. Premium page is designed to provide additional features for the near future.

CREOMAP Region 4

Mobile UI Design

On-The-Job Training Requirement

The design is created for a requirement for our On-The-Job Training that is conducted by CREOTEC Philippines Inc. during the pandemic. The trainees are tasked to create a mobile application with the use of Unity Engine. The mobile application named Creomap Region IVA (this is the region we're assigned) is developed for users to search for a school in a specific location based on the data that was gathered. I was assigned to be the designer in our group and part of is to make a design for the application.


Besides the mobile application requirement in our On-The-Job Traning, There are things and experiences that I've learned in my On-The-Job Training with CREOTEC Philippines Inc. First, I learned being punctual during my time in my training because even it is during pandemic, everyday we are required for a daily time report that is one of the requirement in our training. Second, I improved my communcation skills because I need to communicate to other students not just from my school but at the same time with other students from other schools also. Third, I learned being composed because even that I realized there are a lot of activities to do (ex: daily tasks, online discussion, doing the final output) and it also helps me to be more productive. Lastly, one of the most memorable thing that I've learned in my training that I think i can also apply in working experience is the application of 5S. 5S is a 5-step methodology that uses a list of five Japanese Words, to maintain a well organized and productive workplace.

Performance Evaluation Website

Web Design

Thesis Project Output

This website design is used for our thesis project. The proposed thesis is about the analysis of performance evaluation of the faculty members. The study aims to use classification technique algorithms to achieve the intended objective. The website output is designed and created that gives students a way to provide feedback on a professor's performance to generate data.


The design and development of the thesis idea aim to improve the the evaluation process of faculty performance to ensure the quality of education, as one of the methods to evaluate the performance of faculty members is by the students' feedback. The design used is inspired from the colors representing the school, and all the items shown are for example purposes only and not exactly what the evaluation form directly from the school. On the development side, by conducting sentiment analysis and using classification algorithms, not just the given criteria will be used but also the comments will be a factor in knowing each of the students' responses to know if their comments are positive, negative, or neutral. The study also used nlp or natural language processing to filter out words from the comments of each students and use other technqiues such as word2vec to filter words and evaluated the algorithm models using performance metrics.
